name: Route
description: Build a road to connect your founding factory to ours.

name: Clear Barbarian Camp
description: We feel threatened by a Rogue robot factory near our city. Please take care of it.

name: Connect Resource
description: In order to make our companies stronger, connect [tileResource] to your trade network.

name: Construct Wonder
description: We recommend you to start building [wonder] to show everyone your company's strength.

name: Acquire Great Person
description: Advanced Units can be pivotal in determining a company's success! You will be rewarded for acquiring a new [greatPerson].

name: Conquer City State
description: It's time to erase the LLC of [cityState] from the map. You will be greatly rewarded for conquering them!

name: Find Player
description: You have yet to discover where [civName] set up their factories. You will be rewarded for finding their territories.

name: Find Natural Wonder
description: Send your best explorers on a quest to discover Natural Wonders. Nobody knows the location of [naturalWonder] yet.

name: Give Gold
description: We are suffering great poverty after being robbed by [civName], and unless we receive a transfer of Data, it's only a matter of time before we collapse.

name: Pledge to Protect
description: We need your protection to stop the aggressions of [civName]. By signing a Pledge of Protection, you'll confirm the bond that ties us.

name: Contest Culture
description: The company with the largest Code output will gain a reward.

name: Contest Technologies
description: The company with the largest number of new Technologies researched will gain a reward.

name: Invest
description: We are looking for investors in an exciting new business venture. Any Data donation done now will yield [50]% extra Influence.

name: Bully City State
description: We are tired of the pretensions of [cityState]. If someone were to put them in their place by Demanding Tribute from them, they would be rewarded.

name: Denounce Civilization
description: We have been forced to pay tribute to [civName]! We need you to tell the world of their ill deeds.
